author: Tavia Grant
title: Canada’s food supply at risk as pandemic tightens borders to farm workers
description: Agricultural sector employs about 60,000 temporary foreign workers each year to plant, harvest crops
content:
Farmer Philip Keddy of Charles Keddy Farms throws a pitchfork into his truck after assessing a field of strawberry plant seedlings ready to be harvested and packed for customers on the farm in the Annapolis Valley, N.S. on April 1, 2020.
